monitorEquip.name: Monitor Equipment
monitorEquip.hint: Tracks when a character equips/unequips equipment.

monitorAttune.name: Monitor Attunement
monitorAttune.hint: Tracks when a character attunes to equipment or breaks attunement.

monitorSpellPrep.name: Monitor Spell Preparation
monitorSpellPrep.hint: Tracks when a character prepares/unprepares a spell.

monitorSpellSlots.name: Monitor Spell Slots
monitorSpellSlots.hint: Tracks when a character changes spell slot counts on their character sheet.

monitorFeats.name: Monitor Features
monitorFeats.hint: Tracks when a character changes feature use counts on their character sheet.

monitorResources.name: Monitor Resources
monitorResources.hint: Tracks when a character changes resources values counts on their character sheet.

monitorCurrency.name: Monitor Currency
monitorCurrency.hint: Tracks when a character changes currency on their character sheet.

monitorProficiency.name: Monitor Skill Proficiency
monitorProficiency.hint: Tracks when a character changes skill proficiency.

monitorAbility.name: Monitor Ability Scores
monitorAbility.hint: Tracks when a character changes ability scores.

showGMonly.name: Display Character Monitor to GM Users only
showGMonly.hint: Chat messages can be revealed to players using context menu.

allowPlayerView.name: Allow players to see their own messages
allowPlayerView.hint: If GM-only mode is enabled, this setting allows players to still see their own monitor messages.

showToggle.name: Show Character Monitor Toggle
showToggle.hint: Temporarily disable Character Monitor by toggling off the control button on the token toolbar. The control button is only visible to GM users.

trashIcon.name: Enable Health Monitor Chat Message Trash Icon
